data.text: The fact that there is not a way to download digital purchases from the app is absolutely ridiculous. The app interface is okay, though there are plenty of rough spots. Finding a full list of things you've saved can be tricky and annoying. Navigating through a sellers catalog is also tedious, but it could be worse. Esthetically, the app is lovely. I just wish it were backed up by better functionality.
data.replyText: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport for any concern. Rest assured that we'll assist you right away! Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: I used to love this app, but now it won't even let me log in on the phone app or on my computer. I just keep getting an error message stating "too many requests". I've cleared the cache and storage in the app, I've restarted my phone, and even uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but it still doesn't work. It's very frustrating!

data.text: You know very well there isn't a method to contact support for app issues on your site. This isn't about my account, this is about the way your app is developed. There are certain push notifications I do and don't want, but I don't have the option to choose - trying to toggle any one type of notification takes you to Android OS' notification settings for the app, forcing you into an all or nothing agreement. Either you accept their ads and annoying useless messages, or you get no updates at all.

We’ll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

data.text: Trustworthy company with many protections for the consumer. I am never worried about purchasing from Etsy, and I think it is a great way to support small businesses from all across the world! However, the recent updates to the mobile update makes it confusing to navigate. I preferred when there was a separate tab for my favorites, and it just showed me my lists instead of a continuous "there's only one left of this item!" I think a whole tab just for gift cards is wholly unnecessary.
data.replyText: Thank you for providing this feedback and we're sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused you. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport regarding your concern so that we can check on it further. Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: I used to love shopping on Etsy. Browsing for hours through all of the wonderful goodies. But the app and site have become so messy that it's too overwhelming to use. They have made literally everything a big image which is overstimulating and nowhere is there a place to change the view to a simple list or even smaller images. There's way too much going on and to contact them it's pretty impossible. I won't be using Etsy anymore until they clean it up.

data.text: edit: there's now this new "gift mode" tab. you have to go into the "you" tab to get to your favorites and lists. can there just be a better search engine? the search has gotten awful. this is new; if i'm listening to audio through my phone and browsing the Etsy app, Etsy will pause what i'm listening to to auto-play video clips in the app. why? it does this even on item listings that don't have audio. please turn this off. i dont see a setting for this on my end at all.

data.text: Etsy was easy to use. Not now. The shopping cart's dysfunctional. I've bought a lot in the past. I'm impeded from purchasing much now, as I can't review my shopping cart--it won't display what's in there w/o messing with me. Tho I deleted about 80 items,it still says I have 84 items in there. I've closed &reopened the app 2X, yet it still shows the wrong count, which means I can't add what I wanted to; &why are there 6-7 duplicates?! As I scroll, it repeats PARTS, never getting to the REST! UGH.

We’ll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

data.text: This app features a lot of creators and is great for finding hand-made or unique items. However, the app quotes you delivery times that aren't accurate to the location of the seller, which is exasperated for international shipping. There's also a notification issue where it keeps notifying you daily that you have (no exaggeration) dozens of new messages, but when you open the app, there are none. The items, shops, and sellers are great; but the actual functionality of the app really needs work.
data.replyText: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport for any concern. Rest assured that we'll assist you right away! Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: This used to be the easiest and best app I've ever used. Then they decided to create a new app which doesn't work half the time, fails to upload pictures, and creating a listing is a pain. You have to click extra buttons now to move pics, edit listings, and adjust variations. Half the features are even completed yet or work, and it's so not user friendly anymore. Please go back to the old app.

data.text: UPDATE(1/23/24): This change has been made and I love it! (9/29/18): This app is really great!! The only change I'd like to see is that when adding an item to a list, it appears the lists are in order of creation (maybe first created list at the bottom and most recent at the top), but I'd rather have the list that's been most recently added to at the top (rearranged in order by frequency of use or amount of time since adding), or have the option to just manually arrange them in a desired order
data.replyText: Hi! Thank you so much for your review! We're always hard at work in making improvements towards the app. Your review and feedbacks will only help us improve further. Stay tuned for further updates to the app! You may reach us out here: (etsy.me/contactsupport) for further concerns.

data.text: App works ok. Search is ok, but could be more accurate. The biggest problem is for several months now the app gives a notification 2 or 3 times a day that there's a new item in my favorite store. I check. It shows sold items from 22 weeks ago that I've seen tons of times. Most of the time when I click thru to the store, there's no new items at all.
data.replyText: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

data.text: I've come back to change my rating down to 2 stars - they added auto-playing video previews for products that, even when silent, turn off anything I'm listening to. So instead of scrolling through Etsy and buying stuff while listening to podcasts, I'm getting frustrated and closing the app and doing something else with my podcasts. This has been pretty frustrating, so I hope they can change it soon.
data.replyText: Thanks for your feedback! We would appreciate it if you could contact us using this link: etsy.me/contactsupport and provide specific issues that we can check on further. Rest assured that we'll assist you right away! Thank you, and stay safe!

data.text: Overall, I have had positive experiences shopping on the app. The only reason I'm taking off a star is because of a really annoying issue that I keep experiencing while scrolling through a shop's items. Every few seconds as I am scrolling vertically through the items, it will think I am swiping right, which brings me to the shop's "reviews" tab. It takes a second for me to divert back, but when it does it like 20 times/min, it is ANNOYING. PLEASE make it less sensitive!
data.replyText: Hey, thanks for writing a review. Sometimes, the app may be slow but such instances are rare. If it happens too often, please let us know at https://rb.gy/pucp3f. We'll have things investigated.

data.text: Etsy has changed where you can access your favorites and now it's so hard to navigate to. It used to be on the bottom bar which was great and easily accessible. Instead, it's hidden in your profile and even after opening the Favorites section, it defaults to showing you ads for stuff similar to your favorites? It just feels like the latest few updates have turned Etsy into an ad centric app you have to shift through in order to find the items you're searching for.
data.replyText: Thank you for providing this feedback and we're sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused you. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport regarding your concern so that we can check on it further. Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: Frankly, this app sucks. I've been using Etsy for over ten years, so this review is not for the company itself but the app specifically. It frequently crashes saying "Oops, something went wrong!" or it says something about not being connected to the internet, even when I am. They also do a lot of useless updates that don't actually enhance or improve the user experience, such as moving where favs are or how they are displayed. I end up switching to my browser more often than not these days

data.text: For the most part the app works well but there's so many notifications it's insane! Every day the app seems to want to remind you to exists with both regular and silent notifications! It's so annoying! It also keeps saying I have 3 notifications as I had 3 purchases I had to review... Upon reviewing them, the bubble in the bottom navigation bar still didn't go away.

data.text: Great place for unique gifts and to see lots of creative works. Easy to use, just a couple, little twitches while shopping otherwise it'd be perfect. As an update, got an email saying to share my exp. so they might be able to look into it.I do so and the response was that they dont monitor the box, so talk to the help center. They respond with an answering machine message to look nice. Why would I go thru the "call tree" ( bot or not that's what it is) to bring their problems to their attention?
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review and for choosing Etsy as your shopping platform. Please reach out to us at https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013375488, if you have other suggestions or concerns. Thank you, and be safe!

data.text: My previous issue was resolved more or less. I don't like the change to the location of the favorite lists or this prominent gift selector option. You can't copy your order number from within a receipt through the app. You don't get notifications through the app when a store is back from vacation, only email. We should have ability to ignore Etsy product recommendations to help algorithm. It'd be nice to stop seeing product recommendations from a shop I had issues with and don't want to support
data.replyText: We’re sorry to hear you’ve been experiencing some issues with the app. You can try to restart your device and also clear the cache for the app. If that doesn’t help, we invite you to contact us here: etsy.me/contactsupport with your account details and relevant screenshots. data.text: I've been using Etsy for years, and have never had any problems until now. My previous review was 5 stars, and I'll return it to 5 stars, once this problem has been resolved. Nine days, before Christmas, I ordered a customizable digital download that was supposed to be ready to preview within 24 hours. 3 weeks later, I've received nothing from the seller, except for a promise that they're working on it. I haven't been able to find the "open a case" option that I keep reading about. I'm pissed.
data.replyText: Thank you for reaching out and we’re sorry to hear you didn’t receive your order. We invite you to contact us here: etsy.me/contactsupport with your account details, order number and relevant screenshots. We’ll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

data.text: I absolutely love Etsy! I definitely recommend it for anyone interesting in buying from small businesses, or personalized items. Although, the reason I gave a 4 is because there aren't much options regarding reviews, like if I wish to edit my review I can't. If I wish to delete my review, I can't. So, that is the only thing, but aside from that I love it!
data.replyText: We appreciate your feedback! If there is anything we can help you with please reach out to us at https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013375488.

data.text: this app is becoming more annoying and convoluted with each update... the favorites tab used to be one of the main icons across the bottom, now you have to search for it... instead it's been replaced with "deals" and "gift mode" which i don't use, and to find my favorites i have to click "you" then "favorites" and even then i can't see the items at first! under favorites it opens to "updates" so you have to switch to "items" before you can see what you've favorited... so weird and unnecessary

data.text: I used to open the app all the time to see what new items my favorite shops have listed but now the app doesn't have that section anymore. I'm annoyed that I have to go to individual stores just to browse newly listed items. This app is quickly becoming too cumbersome to navigate and I can never find the niche craft items I'm looking for using the search function so I have to resort to googling it. So backwards that I have to go outside of the app to find the etsy listings I actually want.

data.text: I have been shopping for scrapbooking items quite a bit lately and my search results in the app and on Google are flooded by people on Etsy selling their digital downloads. I have managed to find some great websites because of all the digging around I have had to do that offer much better prices.

data.text: Etsy seems more like an overpriced flea market than a galleria. Not much handcrafted items like there used to be. Tons of cheap junk from Aliexpress being sold on there. Lot of fake scammer accounts on there, so buyer beware. The app is a little buggy. Search function works great but you really have to filter out tons of junk on there. I keep getting notifications that the seller I bought from sent me a coupon code but everytime I tap the notification it takes me to an empty inbox.

data.text: Edit: I keep getting awful spam notifications for basically nothing. I enter the notifications setting in the app only to discover that they are all forced on and cannot be turned off individually. Even though they are all listed out with toggles, clicking them just opens the global notification settings for the app, meaning it's all or nothing, they have taken away the granular control. If you want me to block all of your notifications, so be it. The people who built this app are bad people.

data.text: The perfect place to find all things perfectly unique, hand-made, customized or one-of-a-kind. Something made right here in the good old US of A or something handcrafted abroad in Europe or some where else. A lot of items ship free and those that don't the shipping cost is usually reasonable. data.text: I've been using Etsy as a buyer and seller for 15 years. Within the last year or two, Etsy has made updates to their app that make it essentially unusable. Garbage.

data.text: Love Etsy but it's honestly a really bad and problematic app. It gives me an error message every time I try to go to my cart. It's been months since I could access my cart. Also, when you buy any kind of digital file, you can't download it from the app. Lots more but no room here. Might as well use your browser

data.text: Don't get me wrong, I love the things people make on Etsy and, for thr most part, my stuff has always been amazing! However, I find it super frustrating that you think you have found a good price and then you realize that the "good price" is for a 3t in white and not a women's medium. Another example would be searching for a Stanley brand customized cup only to have to search the detail of every seller because the low price isn't the one pictured- it's for an unbranded cup. Super annoying!

data.text: Great features: categorizing your favorites and easy browsing. Bad features: 1. When you have multiple items in your cart, you cannot see the total from each shop. 2. You never see the shipping amount until you pay. 3. When you delete items from your cart it is incredibly slow. 4. After making a purchase you cannot see the day and time when you placed your order ever on the app. This is a huge issue for me. How does a buyer hold a seller accountable? This app is going downhill fast.

data.text: The functionality of the app is not great, they push WAY TOO MANY notifications from the app that are not related to an order, and it doesn't seem you can 'unselect" an item once you've marked it as a favorite. I constantly get notifications that i have unread messages (which isn't true). It pushes notifications to items i marked with the heart. In order to stop the constant bombardment, I want to unselect them but it wont let you! Very annoying!

data.text: I used to really love browsing on the Etsy app but their last updates have made it less enjoyable. I hate the videos that play automatically because it stops whatever audio you might be listening to. I also don't know why they got rid of the multiple lists of suggested items. I used to spend so much time jumping from list to list and now there's barely anything on the homepage for browsing. I definitely use the app way less now.

data.text: OCT 2023: It's only 1 month later & it's happening again for the entire week; on the rare occasion that the cart page loads (ie 2x out of 12 attempts), I am unable to delete anything from it. On the other hand, it has saved me hundreds of dollars! ..Sep 2023: It's very difficult to make a purchase when the page just spins, & spins, & spins & the page to the shopping cart won't load.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking time to write your review. We’re more than happy to help you, if you wouldn't mind opening a ticket with our support team. Kindly reach out using this link: https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new. Have a wonderful day!

data.text: Latest update has essentially broken the app. I can't access my cart at all without me getting an error. Every. Time. When I could access it, it wouldnt let me delete anything. I also cannot access my favorites section without having to back out of the app multiple times because its a blank screen. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling every time I use this app now and the same thing happens. Really frustrating going into the holiday season.
data.replyText: We’re sorry to hear you’ve been experiencing some issues with the app. You can try to restart your device and also clear the cache for the app. If that doesn’t help, we invite you to contact us here: etsy.me/contactsupport with your account details and relevant screenshots. We’ll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

data.text: Needs to allow shipping options for sellers. We should be able to choose ups, usps, fed ex, etc. I'm repeatedly told by sellers that it isn't allowed. UPDATE: lowered rating because of broken search. Sellers and buyers have complained for years without any fix. Many exact matches are buried in a long list of irrelevant or unmatched search hits. It's beyond frustrating. It's faster to search with google and then open Etsy app. Don't search in Etsy - it's a waste of time.
data.replyText: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We appreciate these comments from the Etsy community, as we collect insights for future adjustments. Kindly let us know what updates or changes you would like to see in our app. Stay safe!

data.text: I love etsy and the app. I frequently add stuff to my cart and then change my mind and "Save it for later." After this last update, I can not save things. The app won't let me. It just does nothing. I thought maybe it was because the save it list had too many items, so I tried to access that list, and it was not there. There used to be a tab at the top of the page of your cart, and you could switch back and forth between the two and add items back into your cart. There is no tab. 🤬
data.replyText: We’re sorry to hear you’ve been experiencing some issues adding items to your cart. Try to restart your device and also clear the cache for the app. If that doesn’t help, we invite you to contact us here: etsy.me/contactsupport with your account details and relevant screenshots. We’ll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

data.text: It works most of the time, I had an issue with one order and tried to get help through the app but couldn't submit a ticket and now the "help with this order" button always leads to the "uh oh something went wrong" page. Also the app doesn't update tracking well. I never know when I'm getting anything. Usually stops updating after "product shipped," I'm like to know where my product is. Review tab isn't working either. I hope it gets fixed soon.
data.replyText: Hi, sorry to hear you’ve been experiencing some issues. You can try to restart your device and also clear the cache for the app. If that doesn’t help, we invite you to contact us here: https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new with further details. We’ll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. Thank you!

data.text: After installing your new update for the app I am no longer able to check out my items. It keeps saying there is a URL issue. There is no way to call and speak with someone regarding this issue, and this is Poor Etsy customer service, not the seller's fault. I do Not like the new update at all. I don't like the videos. I don't like how with the slightest touch, it removes items from my cart; and then I have to go through the process of returning them to my cart. This update is an Epic fail.

data.text: Would be great if you could actually see your digital items and download from the app/phone, it's basically a app just to shop but not full service for sure. Needs major improvements. Very annoying that when you "heart" something it automatically goes into 'favorites' and you can make list and sort but then it's in 2 folders so constantly have to remove every item from favorites. Why give you the option of folders to sort if you're going to add it yourself where we don't want.

data.text: A recent update had added videos and seemed to force every listing to have them as the second photo... but they're not helpful, and they make any music you're listening to stop playing and you have to manually start it again, which is extremely annoying and makes it hard to browse while listening to music... often end up in me just closing the app without actually finding and buying the things I want. Also etsy charges ridiculous fees on sellers and does nothing to weed out drop shippers

data.text: I'm glad the team fixed the weird issues where the same "updates" appeared in both the Favorites and Updates tab, but the new "Deals" tab is total chaos. There's one section that scrolls horizontally and one that's grouped vertically and "shop items on sale" are just random items and "save on your favorites" aren't even on sale! I preferred when it was all together in list format but if you're going to separate things at least make the sections contain what they're labeled to contain!

data.text: I have several complaints about the Etsy app. the help buttons do not take you anywhere and there is very little response from the Etsy. it is also very hard to customize your order so that you can get it in a timely manner if needed. data.text: I see so many designs repeated at shop after shop - sometimes dozens. I feel no confidence that I'm buying from an actual seller and not somewhere that's just ripping off other people's work. Also, as a former seller, I have no interest in ever coming back, knowing my designs will likely just be stolen. It's also very hard to find any information about your orders - like order number, date of order, price paid, etc from the app. I'm not convinced you can which is annoying.

data.text: Love this app! The only thing I'd like fixed is that I have been a user for so long with so many likes that I am unable to search keywords (like "sticker") to sort through my favorites, both on a desktop and on my phone. I wish it could be made easier so I don't have to sift through endless pages trying to find a specific item I liked. It's been this way for several months now.

data.text: The new version of the search function is difficult to use if you're looking for anything specific. I clicked that and got a mix of everything but what I wanted. So sad! 😭

data.text: App really needs an overhaul or something. 1. Bad search feature. Ex, if I'm looking for items listed from least to most expensive, I don't want to see expensive items sprinkled in! data.text: For a while, this app - much like the website itself - had a lot of issues with accessing the cart when you had a lot on there. Considering that having items in your cart is the catalyst for a seller to send coupons, this seems counterintuitive. Issues included forcing you into your Saved For Later every single time you updated the quantity of or removed an item entirely from your cart, or not loading the cart at all. I believe this is fixed but cannot confirm without checking release notes.
data.replyText: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

data.text: The last several times I've bought e-patterns that have to be downloaded, I don't get a link that allows me to download what I paid for. The seller sends me to Etsy to download the pattern, but there's no "button" there that allows me to download my purchase. I then have to contact the seller, which is rapidly becoming a PITA. It was fine up to a couple months ago.

data.text: Help for problems with orders is NOT available. The app's "Help" button is deactivated. The only option is to try to message the seller. data.text: Lots of things to see. Lots of over priced items that I can make in no time. But they mailed up due to the fees etsy charges. All my hard work to go to a platform to sell from? data.text: There needs to be a way to filter out unwanted content. I only got the app to purchase a cosplay print book from a cosplayer I follow, and yet my deals section was populated with nude/suggestive figurines. I don't need to see that. Clicking on it to try and find a "do not recommend" option just adds it to your history. You have to go to a browser just to delete that history. Plenty of other sites have hide or don't recommend options. Etsy needs that.
data.replyText: Thanks for taking out time to rate us. It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best. If you experience any dissatisfaction, please contact our customer care at https://rb.gy/pucp3f.

data.text: I enjoy the marketplace of Etsy, but the app has a few flaws - my primary complaint is that the order page doesn't list every item in a perchance, leading to duplicate perchances which is a headache for both buyers & sellers. the only way to see a full itemized list is on the website - not even the confirmation emails have the full perchance list
data.replyText: Thank you for providing this feedback and we're sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused you. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport regarding your concern so that we can check on it further. Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: I rarely buy through Etsy, but only a few days after making some purchases, I've begun receiving unsolicited text messages for some website I've never been to (makesy). I don't know if it's Etsy or the vendors, but I'm certain one of them let out my phone number. Besides these purchases, I haven't had any other online transactions recently.
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at https://rb.gy/pucp3f.

data.text: Ordered a gift for a friend. Initially, I had no idea what the item was called, but of all the items on the site, I found the name of a similar one and from there, the item was easy to find - using the visual search capabilities of the site (search tools). In addition, once I placed my order, I was kept apprised of the order's progress and was informed when it was delivered/received. This was a welcome added touch. Finally, being a 1st time buyer I was requested to verify my ID info when . . .
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words encourage us greatly. If you experience any dissatisfaction, please contact our customer care at https://rb.gy/pucp3f. Happy shopping!

data.text: Can't see my favorites anymore. I have an android phone. On and off for several months, my favorites will not show up. Either nothing happens or a message of "oops something went wrong ", appears. The only way I can see them is to delete the app and reinstall it. Oh, and I update the app whenever notified.
data.replyText: Hi, we are sorry that you faced an issue. Could you please share your contact details with us on https://rb.gy/pucp3f so that we can get in touch with you and resolve the issue.

data.text: Uninstalling for two reasons and I don't use it much anyway. 1. It won't let me turn off "suggestion" notifications without turning off order notifications. 2. I don't want to rate or review my orders or their sellers but the app will not clear my notifications unless I do so. We can't leave feedback for Etsy on the website or in the app. I left a lousy review for some poor vendor because I didn't want to leave a review at all, then I couldn't delete it or edit it after I tried. Who does this?
data.replyText: Thank you for providing this feedback and we're sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused you. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport regarding your concern so that we can check on it further. Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: The app works fine, but what a shame that it's still not a good shopping option. I came back to purchase on etsy after I believed they had learned their social lesson. But they STILL aren't a safe shopping option. I put together an order over $120 and tried to purchase. Then I noticed my bank account was going to be charged DOUBLE the amount of my order. I had to contact my bank to report the issue. What a shame that etsy can't be utilized safely. Do better folks.🤷
data.replyText: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport and provide specific issues that we can check on further. Rest assured that we'll assist you right away! Thank you and stay safe!

data.text: I did like it a lot until they added the auto video play that I can't turn off. It stops my music every time I come across a video. Please either tell me how I can turn this off or you need an update giving us the ability to turn it off. It has become so annoying that I don't even want to shop on Etsy.
data.replyText: Thanks for your feedback. We’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to https://rb.gy/pucp3f. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

data.text: I am having quite a bit of trouble getting pdf files that I purchase from sellers. I am having to reach out to each one and request that they send the file to my personal email instead of through the app. This is certainly inconvenient to them and myself. Something within the app has changed, and it's not working like it used to.
data.replyText: Thank you for providing this feedback and we're sorry for the inconvenience that this has caused you. Kindly contact our Support team using this link etsy.me/contactsupport regarding your concern so that we can check on it further. Thank you and stay safe!
